About.title: HISTORY
description: Welcome to Dias Clinic, your excellence in aesthetics nestled in the heart of Notting Hill! With three years dedicated to enhancing beauty and well-being, we have proudly earned the title of the top-rated clinic for the prestigious years of 2021, 2022, and 2023, solidifying our reputation with impeccable five-star reviews.

At Dias Clinic, we offer cutting-edge facial and body treatments. Explore our array of procedures, from the innovative EMS Body Sculp to the proven efficacy of Radio Frequency, Pressotherapy, Lipo Laser, and Lymphatic Drainage Massage. We are committed to delivering transformative experiences, cellulite treatments, mesotherapy, fat-dissolving injections, and the revitalizing benefits of B12, C, and D vitamins.

To enhance facial beauty, we present exclusive treatments such as PRX, Profhilo Biorevitalization, Radio Frequency, HydraFacial, and specialised acne treatments. Uncover skin perfection with our deep facial cleaning services, Dermapen, and Dermaplaning.

Location.title: OBLIQUE HOUSE OF NAILS
Location.address: 15 BUTE ST, SOUTH KENSINGTON, LONDON, UK
Location.description: Oblique Beauty House is a unique beauty destination that offers total make-over solutions for your hands, feet, brows, lashes, make-up and full hair services in a luxurious yet friendly atmosphere!
